steps.title: Be our guest
steps.content: Guests are always welcome. They are able to participate in our meetings as Table Topics speakers and a few roles of their choosing.

steps.title: Have an icebreaker
steps.content: As a guest we encourage you to register and prepare your first Ice Breaker. It is the best way to introduce yourself to the club and feel the stage under your feet.

steps.title: Be one of us
steps.content: Become a member. Choose a pathway and participate actively to becoming a great public speaker and a great leader within our club.
